verse.name: v1a
verse.lines: In the secret in the quiet place in the stillness you are there

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines: In the secret in the quiet hour I wait only for you cause I want to know you more

verse.name: c1a
verse.lines: I want to know you, I want to hear your voice I want to know you more

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines: I want to touch you, I want to see your face, I want to know you more

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines: I am reaching for the highest goal that I might receive the prize

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines: Pressing onward pushing every hindrance aside out of my way cause I want to know you more
